meta.title: Getting Started - Voxly Help Center
meta.description: Learn how to get started with Voxly AI Language Tutor

hero.title: Getting Started with Voxly
hero.subtitle: Your journey to language fluency starts here

welcome.title: Welcome to Voxly!
welcome.content: Voxly is your AI-powered language learning companion that helps you practice real conversations in your target language. Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner, Voxly adapts to your level and helps you improve every day.

steps.title: Choose Your Language
steps.content: Select the language you want to learn from the dropdown menu at the top of the conversation screen. Voxly currently supports 12 languages including Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, and English.

steps.title: Enable Voice (Optional)
steps.content: Toggle the voice button if you want to practice speaking. This requires microphone access. You can practice both by speaking and typing.

steps.title: Start the Conversation
steps.content: Click the 'Start Conversation' button. Voxly will greet you in your target language and you can begin practicing!

steps.title: Keep Practicing
steps.content: The more you practice, the more Voxly learns about your level and preferences. Your progress is tracked automatically.

changeLanguage.title: Changing Your Learning Language
changeLanguage.content: To change your target language, simply select a different language from the dropdown menu at the top of the conversation screen. You can switch languages at any time - your progress is saved separately for each language.
changeLanguage.note: Note: Switching languages will clear your current conversation but your vocabulary and progress data is preserved.

understandingInterface.title: Understanding the Interface
understandingInterface.content: The Voxly interface is designed to be intuitive and focused on conversation practice.

elements.name: Chat Area
elements.description: This is where your conversation with Voxly appears. Messages from the AI are shown in purple bubbles, your messages in light purple.

elements.name: Avatar
elements.description: The animated avatar shows when Voxly is speaking. The avatar animates and pulses during speech.

elements.name: Sidebar
elements.description: On the right side, you'll find your conversation history, vocabulary tips, and learning statistics.

elements.name: Microphone Button
elements.description: Click to speak your responses. The button pulses when recording.

elements.name: Quiz Button
elements.description: After conversations, you can take quizzes to test your understanding.

tips.title: Tips for Success
items: Practice daily, even if it's just for 5 minutes
Don't be afraid to make mistakes - that's how you learn
Use the voice feature to practice pronunciation
Review your vocabulary tips after each conversation
Take quizzes to reinforce what you've learned
Start with simple phrases and gradually increase complexity
